ServiceInformationRequest.name: ServiceInformationRequest
ServiceInformationRequest.description: Represents information about a service information request, such as the date and time when the request was submitted and the type of service requested.

AccessTokenUsageStatus.description: Indicates the usage status of the access token that was sent with the request.

ApplicationUrl.description: The URL of the application used by the requester.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the service information request.

ClientSourceSysIdentifier.description: An identifier of the client's source system that sent the request.

ContextType.description: Specifies the context from which the service information request was launched.

DocRequiredReasonType.description: Indicates the reason why the documentation is required. For example, it may be required to be submitted with a prior-auhtorization or claim.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

RecipientOrgIdentifierId.description: The unique identifier of the organization to whom the request was sent.

RequestDateTime.description: The date and time when the request was recieved.

RequestPayload.description: The input payload sent as part of the request.

RequesterExternalIdentifier.description: The identifier of the user who sent the request, as recorded in an external system.

RequesterOrgExtlIdentifier.description: The identifier of the organization that sent the request, as recorded in an external system.

RequesterOrgStdIdentifierId.description: The unique standard identifier of the organization that sent the request.

RequesterStandardIdentifierId.description: The unique standard identifier of the user who sent the request.

ResponseCode.description: The status code returned in response to the request.

ResponseDateTime.description: The date and time when the response to the request was sent.

ServiceType.description: Specifies the type of service that was requested.

SourceType.description: Specifies the type of system that captured the request.

SvcRqstInvocationIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the service request invocation.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the service information request. For example, Coverage Requirement Discovery (CRD) or Documentation Templates and Rules (DTR).
